title: Law governing the Organisation of Banking
title_en: Law governing the Organisation of Banking

provisions.title: Article 123 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 23/9/2017 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr. NGIRENTE Edouard Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
